events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the item has a large scratch on the screen and does not work properly.
The reported problem has been identified as a product defect due to the scratch and faulty performance.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the defective product issue reported.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear about the issue with your product. I’m here to help resolve this as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide photos of the scratch and describe any problems you’re experiencing so we can assist you better?
I attached several pictures showing the scratch and the screen flickering issue happens when I try to turn it on.
We can offer you a replacement unit or a full refund. Please let us know which option you prefer and we’ll arrange it immediately.
Thank you for the quick response. I would prefer a replacement rather than a refund if possible.
Your replacement request has been processed. You will receive the new unit within 5 business days at no extra cost.
Just checking in to confirm you received your replacement and that everything is working perfectly.
Yes, I received the replacement today and it is in perfect condition. Thank you for your help!
The case has been formally closed as the customer has confirmed the issue was fully resolved with the replacement.
A satisfaction survey has been sent to gather feedback on your recent service experience regarding the defective product.
